name: Try To Fall Asleep
description: John Herrin survived a horrible accident, damaging his brain and memory. Through falling asleep, he can rediscover his unfortunate past in his dreams, but because of his brain damage he'll start to see visions and hallucinations, and falling asleep won't be as easy as it seems at first...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Vista, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB Storage: 2 GB available space
